headline: Charles Schwab Aligns New Leadership With Higher Dividend And Growth Focus
summary: Charles Schwab (NYSE:SCHW) announced a 19% increase in its regular quarterly dividend. The company is restructuring leadership, with senior executive retirements and new reporting lines across wealth, banking, technology, operations, and data. Neesha Hathi will oversee combined wealth and banking operations, while Dennis Howard will lead a new technology, operations, and data organization. These moves reflect an executive succession plan and Board support for Schwab's current direction. For...

headline: Is Charles Schwab (SCHW) Fairly Priced After Strong Five Year Share Price Performance
summary: If you are wondering whether Charles Schwab is still fairly priced or starting to look interesting, this article will walk through what the numbers are saying about the stock's value. With the share price at US$103.92 and recent returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 2.3% over 30 days, 2.3% year to date, 27.2% over 1 year and 99.0% over 5 years, many investors are asking what is already baked into the current price. Recent coverage of Charles Schwab has focused on its role as a major US brokerage and...
